contextDescription: Introduction to SQL (Structured Query Language) databases, covering the fundamentals of MySQL database management, basic CRUD operations, and data querying techniques
learningObjectives: Understand what databases are and their purpose
Create databases and tables in MySQL
Perform basic CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete)
Execute queries with constraints and filtering
Work with subqueries and basic functions
Understand data types and constraints in MySQL
Import and export data to/from databases
Manage databases through command line tools
